protocol.name: P-GSE20225-1
text: ABS_CALL = the call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)
DETECTION P-VALUE = p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

protocol.name: P-GSE20225-2
protocol.text: The plants were grown on ATS media incubated vertically for 14 days. The growth conditions were long day (16 hours of 50-100 µM/m²s white light, 8 hours dark). The temperature applied was 24°C +/- 1

protocol.name: P-GSE20225-4
protocol.text: Labelled using protocol described in manual "Affymetrix GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual", One-Cycle target labelling

protocol.name: P-GSE20225-5
protocol.text: Biotin Labelled cRNA using "Affymetrix GeneChip Hybridization, Wash and Stain Kit", according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA

protocol.name: P-GSE20225-6
protocol.text: Agilent 2500A GeneArray Scanner. Scanned according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA.

protocol.name: P-GSE20225-7
protocol.text: Raw data from the microarrays was normalized at probe-level using the MAS5 algorithm. The detection calls (present, marginal, absent) for each probe set was obtained using the GCOS system.
